text.en: Out of the primordially pure unelaborate space of luminous awareness,
As the magical manifestation of unobstructed spontaneous presence,
Arises the compassionate one, the one and only mother of all victorious ones,
text.en-trans: tukjé gyalwa kün gyi yum chik ma

text.en: Noble Lady Ārya Tārā, glorious bestower of longevity,
text.en-trans: jetsün arya taré tsé jin pal

text.en: To you I pray! Take control of my vital winds and mind,
text.en-trans: solwa deb so lungsem wangdü né

text.en: And increase my lifespan and merit!
text.en-trans: tsé dang sönam pelwar dzé du sol

text.en: Through the power of praising and praying to you,
text.en-trans: khyé la tö ching solwa tabpé tü

text.en: May my lifespan, merit, splendour and wealth increase,
text.en-trans: dak gi tsé sö paljor gyepa dang

text.en: And the sixteen fears,1adversity and obstacles be dispelled.
text.en-trans: jikpa chudruk kyen ngen barché sol

text.en: Subjugate spirits and disruptive forces who prey upon beings,
text.en-trans: dro la nöpé dön gek jungpo tul

text.en: And may all thosedamsidemons who would harm the teachings
text.en-trans: ten la tsé jé damsi malüpa

text.en: Be pacified through the force of your compassionate power and strength,
text.en-trans: ma khyö tukjé nütü tob tsal gyi

text.en: So that the teachings spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: malü zhi zhing tenpa gyepar dzö

text.en: Grant your blessings, so that the lives of the noble holders of the teachings may be extended,
And the saṅgha community may flourish and grow.
text.en-trans: gendün dé tsok pelwar jingyi lob
